column4: Hmm, I have a thought.  Is there any way I can keep the graphical login but allow each of my users to have a different WM?
my son is used to GNOME, but I prefer KDE, for example
well, they can choose which session to use from the GDM (or KDM) menu
i mean simply the login screen. the "Options" button there allows one to choose GNOME, KDE or whatever you have installed
